name: ws-tcp-bridge
description: Simple WebSocket <-> TCP bridge with optional mDNS discovery and local serial exposure (dev helper).

scripts.build:pkg:mac: npm run fetch-web && rm -rf dist/mac && pkg . --targets node18-macos-x64,node18-macos-arm64 --out-path dist/mac
scripts.build:pkg:linux: npm run fetch-web && rm -rf dist/linux && pkg . --targets node18-linux-x64,node18-linux-arm64 --out-path dist/linux
scripts.build:pkg:win: npm run fetch-web && rm -rf dist/win && pkg . --targets node18-win-x64 --out-path dist/win
scripts.build:legacy:win7: rm -rf dist/win-legacy && cd legacy && npm install && npm run build:pkg:win7 && cd .. && ls -l ./dist/win-legacy
scripts.build:pkg:all: npm run fetch-web && npm run build:pkg:mac && npm run build:pkg:linux && npm run build:pkg:win && npm run build:legacy:win7 && ls -l ./dist/mac && ls -l ./dist/linux && ls -l ./dist/win && ls -l ./dist/win-legacy
